Detailed Description

The abstract superclass of classes which define custom View hierarchies.

Extend this class and implement onCreateView to return a custom View hierarchy.

This class also supplies several utility methods for controlling the behavior of the UI of the Engage library.

Member Function Documentation

abstract View onCreateView ( Context  context,
LayoutInflater  inflater,
ViewGroup  container,
Bundle  savedInstanceState 
) [pure virtual]

Implement this method to return your custom view hierarchy for embedding in the Engage library UI.

This method should have no side effects as it may be called more than once per activity.

Parameters:
contextThe Context
inflaterA LayoutInflater which can be used to inflate your layout file
containerThe ViewGroup to which your view will be attached
savedInstanceStateAny state saved
Returns:
Your custom sign-in view

Retrieves the Activity object this custom view is a member of

Returns:
The Activity this custom view is a member of

void showProgressIndicator ( boolean  cancelable,
DialogInterface.OnCancelListener  cancelListener 
)

Utility method to show a progress indicator, convenient for usage during custom username/password authentication. This is not the only way to display a progress dialog, it is also possible to use getActivity to have the Activity object to use with the Android Dialog classes.

Parameters:
cancelableWhether the progress dialog is cancelable by the user, for example by pressing the back button
cancelListenerThe listener notified when the dialog is canceled (e.g. by the back button). Null for no listener
void dismissProgressIndicator ( )

Dismiss the progress dialog displayed by showProgressIndicator
